**The Flip** is the cooperative VR shooter youâ€™ve been waiting for! Flip City is overrun with the undead and itâ€™s up to intrepid survivors to blast through the hordes. Filled with ravenous nano-tech-infused zombie hordes, jump into missions solo or better yet, team up with friends. Using The Flipâ€™s built-in voice chat you can easily coordinate with the group or just scream ğŸ˜± at them!

**Features:**

- ğŸ¤ | **4 Player Co-op Fun** - Team up with 3 mates on epic 15-minute runs or make new friends in the 12-player lobbies!

- ğŸš€ | **Mission Overload!**- A mission DJ flips up levels and modifiers on constant rotation, giving you over 2,000 different missions to engage in.

- ğŸ”« | **A powerful arsenal** - Dual-wield Shotguns, SMGs, Grenade launchers and more!

- ğŸšï¸ | **Dynamic Difficulty** - The more you play the larger the hordes get. Pick a mission and hope for the best!

- ğŸ§Ÿ | **Mission Masochist** - Choose from â€œStandardâ€ or â€œSpecialâ€ missions that let you dive into â€˜Ultra Hardcoreâ€™ missions - or just build up XP in the explosive â€œDook Nookâ€ missions.

- ğŸ© | **Dress for Success** - Successfully Exfil to gain XP and level up, unlocking new avatars and outfits!

- ğŸ  | **Home Sweet Home** - Chill with your mates, play some basketball or customise your character before heading back in for more zombie guts!

changelog.change_log:
v.1.74986233
- Improved notification of app updates so users are aware when new stuff is available
- Fix issues with helicopters not landing in the lobby

Update 1.74896227 - 19/04/2024
- Doubled turn speed for smooth turning
- Increased minimum difficulty level so new users see more zombies quicker!
